page.title: 07Adbaston 1st sch. Curriculum
page.content: Curriculum includes language development; maths; environmental studies; science (which emphasises encouraging observation); art, craft and pottery; physical education (including swimming); religious education; music; computer assisted learning and Logo programming. Children participate in an annual School's Music Festival at Lonsdale School, Eccleshall; they also have 2 theatre visits and an educational visit each year. School facilities include a colour T.V. and a computer also portable P.E. equipment. There is a playground and a playing field. Children communicate well verbally, their written work and play indicate that they are influenced by watching a lot of T.V. at home.
